summary: Possible Titles for the Upcoming Avengers 4:
body:
Possible Titles for the Upcoming Avengers 4:

  1. Avengers 4: We’ll Kill All Your Favorite Characters
  2. Avengers 4: Damnation To All
  3. Avengers 4: What The Fuck is a Happy Ending?
  4. Avengers 4: Dust, Dust, Dust Everywhere
  5. Avengers 4: You’ll Never Forget This
  6. Avengers 4: It’ll Haunt You for the Rest of your Life
  7. Avengers 4: Avengers no More
  8. Avengers 4: Mr. Stark?

summary: Captain America no more? Chris Evans shares emotional goodbye to Avengers 4
title: Captain America no more? Chris Evans shares emotional goodbye to Avengers 4
body:
First Chris Evans quits Radio 2 breakfast, and now it looks like the other Chris Evans is bidding a fond farewell to his most iconic gig too.

37-year-old Evans, who has played Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe since 2011’s Captain America: The First Avenger, seemed to be signing off from the role with his latest tweet.

“Officially wrapped on Avengers 4,” Evans tweeted to his 9.69 million fans. “It was an emotional day to say the least. Playing this role over the last 8 years has been an honor.”

Officially wrapped on Avengers 4. It was an emotional day to say the least. Playing this role over the last 8 years has been an honor. To everyone in front of the camera, behind the camera, and in the audience, thank you for the memories! Eternally grateful.

— Chris Evans (@ChrisEvans) October 4, 2018

It’s long been assumed that the as-yet-untitled fourth Avengers film would be Evans’ final outing as super-soldier Steve Rogers, and the actor’s latest social media post seems to confirm the bad news for fans.

Evans was initially confirmed as Marvel’s Captain America back in 2010. He joined the franchise on a six-picture deal that was extended to seven when the fourth Avengers film was split into two. He’s since appeared in Captain America: The First Avenger (2011), The Avengers (Avengers Assemble in the UK) (2012), Avengers: Age of Ultron (2014), Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2015), Captain America: Civil War (2016), Avengers: Infinity War (2018), and will appear in 2019’s Avengers 4.

He’s also made cameo appearances as Cap in Thor: The Dark World (2013), Ant-Man (2015), and Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017).

A New York Times profile earlier this year confirmed Evans’ plan to retire from the role, saying: “You want to get off the train before they push you off”. 

He’s become a firm fan favourite, and it’s hard to imagine anyone else in the role now, but Disney will now be looking to the future of the Marvel Cinematic Universe without some of its biggest names. Brie Larson’s Captain Marvel is being talked up as a key player going forward, but beyond Avengers 4, very little is known about what the future holds for the MCU.

Avengers 4 is coming to cinemas in 2019.


Read more
More screen time for Cap promised in Avengers 4
Embarrassing early roles of the Infinity War cast
Chris Evans named best value actor

summary: A Little Help, Please? (2) Chapter Title: Therapy Session Pairing: Bucky Barnes x reader  Summary: James Buchanan Barnes carries...
body:
A Little Help, Please? (2)

Chapter Title: Therapy Session

Pairing: Bucky Barnes x reader

Summary: James Buchanan Barnes carries almost 70 years worth of PTSD and no one is able to help him, not even his best friend. When Tony suggests a meeting with you a professional psychiatrist, he starts to see in a different mind set and let his old self return. Only seeing one new thing he wants in his future is you.

Chapter Warnings: Mentions of PTSD?

Word Count: 1062

A/N: Requested by @dabbadabbamoo, sorry it took so long.

A Helping Hand, Therapy Session, Emotional Attachment, Past I Remember Them All, In The End…She Saved Me


The Drive to the compound was short, you had thought about walking there but your heels would have killed your feet halfway there. You were nervous on meeting James, not sure what to expect from the ex-assassin. To your luck you saw Tony waiting outside the entrance door as you parked, he greeted you with a hug and a big friendly smile.

“Thank you so much for doing this.” Tony thanked and ushered you into the building. “I booked a private office for the two of you, he’s actually waiting there now.” Tony showed you into an elevator and told his AI to take him to the floor James was on.

“Wow Tony this place in incredible.” You looked out the glass walls of the elevator. You could see some of the Avengers training outside, you wonder where the rest of them are.

“Well you know me.” Tony shrugged, you turned to look at him, raising your eyebrow at his reply. “I’m kidding.” He chuckled. The elevator doors opened and the two of you stepped out and headed down the hall to the room Tony had booked out for you. “He’s in there.” Tony left you outside the door, you waited for a moment to gather your thoughts then entered the room.

“Good afternoon, I’m Dr. Y/n Y/l/n thank you for agreeing to see me James.” You introduce yourself and took a seat opposite James and smiled politely. Bucky was surprised, he didn’t expect you to walk through the door, he expected some old women in her 50’s to make an appearance but wow were you something else.

“Bucky. My friends call me Bucky.” He stared at you wide eyed and stunned.

“But we aren’t really friends yet, are we?” You smiled at him, earning a chuckle from him. “Anyways, I understand that you are undergoing some pretty traumatic experiences through nightmares, would you like to talk about that?” You clasped your hands together and placed them in front of you.

“Is this some kind of therapy session?” Bucky scoffed and leaned back in his chair, you expected this kind of behaviour it’s become a common thing said by most of your patients.

“It’s whatever you like it to be, I’m just trying to help you.”

“What if I don’t want help?” He sat forward almost like he was challenging you, you nodded and bit the inside of your cheek.

“Surely everyone needs a little help, no? I mean, I’ve helped most of the Avengers behind Tony and it seems to be working.” You told, this wasn’t going to be a walk in the park. Bucky will be difficult, challenging but like Tony said you are the best.

“But everyone else isn’t me, they haven’t seen what I’ve seen, they haven’t done the horrible things I’ve done.” Bucky’s voice trailed off at the last sentence and you felt an ache in your heart, you always do when someone is just about to open up.

“And what things are they? I promise you James that everything you say will only stay between us.” You encouraged, you could tell he wanted to open up but he was afraid. Bucky stared at you, looking for anything that says you’re lying but he saw nothing but kindness in your smile and emotion in your eyes. He sighed.

“Where do I start? 20 years worth of being tortured and broken then 50 years of being frozen and only let out to assassinate people then wiped and put back in the freezer.” Bucky sighed deeply. “And when you think it’s all over and look forward to a night’s sleep, it’s disturbed by the nightmares of the past coming back to take hold of you once again.” Bucky rocked on the chair, looking anywhere but your eyes, you were looking at him and felt absolutely terrible for him, your heart ached even more for him. Tony said he was broken but you didn’t imagine how broken he actually was.

“I’m so sorry.” Your voice came out a whisper and that’s when he looked at you and saw a lot of emotion behind your eyes.

“It’s not your doing, I wouldn’t expect you to understand.” Bucky’s whole demeanour changed, he put the wall back up. “Can I go now? I told you everything you want to know.” He didn’t wait for your answer and got up to leave.

You leaned back in your chair letting out a shaky sigh, this was going to be a lot harder than you thought.

Later that night over dinner, Bucky sat in silence he didn’t touch his food and wasn’t listening to the constant chatter that filled the room. Across from him Tony studied Bucky and something wasn’t right, maybe something went wrong at the meeting.

“Buck, why are you not eating?” Steve drew his attention to his best friend. Bucky looked up at Steve with a stone cold expression.

“I’ve lost my appetite.” Bucky pushed his chair back and left again, heading to his room to be alone. Not long after a knock on Bucky’s door pulled him from his thoughts. “Whoever you are, go away.”

“Bucky did something happen with your talk with Y/n?” Bucky groaned at the sound of Tony’s voice from the other end of the door. He dragged himself off the bed and thumped towards the door.

“Why?” Bucky stood there arms crossed, he clearly didn’t want to be bothered.

“Just give her a chance, it will do you some good.” Tony handed a folded piece of paper to Bucky and left. Unfolding the paper it had a number on it. Yours. He rolled his eyes and threw it on his nightstand.

The next morning Bucky had no sleep the night before and had constantly woken up in sweats and tears. He thought about what you had said yesterday and what Tony said as well, maybe he might give you a chance. He grabbed his phone and typed in your number to send a message. 

Today was your day off and you didn’t plan anything for the day ahead, just having some time to yourself. Your phone had notified you that some had texted, upon reading it you were surprised that James had texted you.

You turned your phone off and went to go get washed and dressed to be ready for the day ahead.

ALHP? @okwhatevaa, @little-big-mac , @fandom-addict-aesthetics , @cutiepiemimi13 , @topoffyourhat , @jacelynenursalim

Permanent - @doowneey, @m-a-t-91 , @fuckthatfeeling , @jitterbuck , @ria132love , @pvnk-bivch , @etherealmandi , @alicia5833 , @5aftermidnight , @lanijoyxo , @typicaltrashbagg

Today was your day off and you didn’t plan anything for the day ahead, just having some time to yourself. Your phone had notified you that some had texted, upon reading it you were surprised that James had texted you.

You turned your phone off and went to go get washed and dressed to be ready for the day ahead.

Permanent - @doowneey, @m-a-t-91 , @fuckthatfeeling , @jitterbuck , @ria132love , @pvnk-bivch , @etherealmandi , @alicia5833 , @5aftermidnight , @lanijoyxo , @typicaltrashbagg

trail.content_raw:
A Little Help, Please? (2)

Chapter Title: Therapy Session

Pairing: Bucky Barnes x reader

Summary: James Buchanan Barnes carries almost 70 years worth of PTSD and no one is able to help him, not even his best friend. When Tony suggests a meeting with you a professional psychiatrist, he starts to see in a different mind set and let his old self return. Only seeing one new thing he wants in his future is you.

Chapter Warnings: Mentions of PTSD?

Word Count: 1062

A/N: Requested by @dabbadabbamoo, sorry it took so long.

A Helping Hand, Therapy Session, Emotional Attachment, Past I Remember Them All, In The End…She Saved Me


The Drive to the compound was short, you had thought about walking there but your heels would have killed your feet halfway there. You were nervous on meeting James, not sure what to expect from the ex-assassin. To your luck you saw Tony waiting outside the entrance door as you parked, he greeted you with a hug and a big friendly smile.

“Thank you so much for doing this.” Tony thanked and ushered you into the building. “I booked a private office for the two of you, he’s actually waiting there now.” Tony showed you into an elevator and told his AI to take him to the floor James was on.

“Wow Tony this place in incredible.” You looked out the glass walls of the elevator. You could see some of the Avengers training outside, you wonder where the rest of them are.

“Well you know me.” Tony shrugged, you turned to look at him, raising your eyebrow at his reply. “I’m kidding.” He chuckled. The elevator doors opened and the two of you stepped out and headed down the hall to the room Tony had booked out for you. “He’s in there.” Tony left you outside the door, you waited for a moment to gather your thoughts then entered the room.

[[MORE]]

“Good afternoon, I’m Dr. Y/n Y/l/n thank you for agreeing to see me James.” You introduce yourself and took a seat opposite James and smiled politely. Bucky was surprised, he didn’t expect you to walk through the door, he expected some old women in her 50’s to make an appearance but wow were you something else.

“Bucky. My friends call me Bucky.” He stared at you wide eyed and stunned.

“But we aren’t really friends yet, are we?” You smiled at him, earning a chuckle from him. “Anyways, I understand that you are undergoing some pretty traumatic experiences through nightmares, would you like to talk about that?” You clasped your hands together and placed them in front of you.

“Is this some kind of therapy session?” Bucky scoffed and leaned back in his chair, you expected this kind of behaviour it’s become a common thing said by most of your patients.

“It’s whatever you like it to be, I’m just trying to help you.”

“What if I don’t want help?” He sat forward almost like he was challenging you, you nodded and bit the inside of your cheek.

“Surely everyone needs a little help, no? I mean, I’ve helped most of the Avengers behind Tony and it seems to be working.” You told, this wasn’t going to be a walk in the park. Bucky will be difficult, challenging but like Tony said you are the best.

“But everyone else isn’t me, they haven’t seen what I’ve seen, they haven’t done the horrible things I’ve done.” Bucky’s voice trailed off at the last sentence and you felt an ache in your heart, you always do when someone is just about to open up.

“And what things are they? I promise you James that everything you say will only stay between us.” You encouraged, you could tell he wanted to open up but he was afraid. Bucky stared at you, looking for anything that says you’re lying but he saw nothing but kindness in your smile and emotion in your eyes. He sighed.

“Where do I start? 20 years worth of being tortured and broken then 50 years of being frozen and only let out to assassinate people then wiped and put back in the freezer.” Bucky sighed deeply. “And when you think it’s all over and look forward to a night’s sleep, it’s disturbed by the nightmares of the past coming back to take hold of you once again.” Bucky rocked on the chair, looking anywhere but your eyes, you were looking at him and felt absolutely terrible for him, your heart ached even more for him. Tony said he was broken but you didn’t imagine how broken he actually was.

“I’m so sorry.” Your voice came out a whisper and that’s when he looked at you and saw a lot of emotion behind your eyes.

“It’s not your doing, I wouldn’t expect you to understand.” Bucky’s whole demeanour changed, he put the wall back up. “Can I go now? I told you everything you want to know.” He didn’t wait for your answer and got up to leave.

You leaned back in your chair letting out a shaky sigh, this was going to be a lot harder than you thought.

Later that night over dinner, Bucky sat in silence he didn’t touch his food and wasn’t listening to the constant chatter that filled the room. Across from him Tony studied Bucky and something wasn’t right, maybe something went wrong at the meeting.

“Buck, why are you not eating?” Steve drew his attention to his best friend. Bucky looked up at Steve with a stone cold expression.

“I’ve lost my appetite.” Bucky pushed his chair back and left again, heading to his room to be alone. Not long after a knock on Bucky’s door pulled him from his thoughts. “Whoever you are, go away.”

“Bucky did something happen with your talk with Y/n?” Bucky groaned at the sound of Tony’s voice from the other end of the door. He dragged himself off the bed and thumped towards the door.

“Why?” Bucky stood there arms crossed, he clearly didn’t want to be bothered.

“Just give her a chance, it will do you some good.” Tony handed a folded piece of paper to Bucky and left. Unfolding the paper it had a number on it. Yours. He rolled his eyes and threw it on his nightstand.

The next morning Bucky had no sleep the night before and had constantly woken up in sweats and tears. He thought about what you had said yesterday and what Tony said as well, maybe he might give you a chance. He grabbed his phone and typed in your number to send a message. 

Today was your day off and you didn’t plan anything for the day ahead, just having some time to yourself. Your phone had notified you that some had texted, upon reading it you were surprised that James had texted you.

You turned your phone off and went to go get washed and dressed to be ready for the day ahead.

Tony said he was broken but you didn’t imagine how broken he actually was.

“Buck, why are you not eating?” Steve drew his attention to his best friend. Bucky looked up at Steve with a stone cold expression.

“I’ve lost my appetite.” Bucky pushed his chair back and left again, heading to his room to be alone. Not long after a knock on Bucky’s door pulled him from his thoughts. “Whoever you are, go away.”

summary: We all know that Scott Lang is World's Best Dad Grandma
body:
We all know that Scott Lang is World’s Best Dad Grandma

So that means Scott also low-key adopted all the avengers with shitty/absent dads

Like we know Tony is Peters new dad but Scott is both their dad’s, Loki’s dad, Thor’s dad on a bad day, Bruce’s dad, everyone’s mf dad and no one can change my mind

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Amerika kapitány visszavonul
body:
Chris Evans nemrég jelentette be Twitter-bejegyzésben, hogy tíz film után visszavonul Amerika kapitány szerepétől, vagyis a jövőre érkező Végtelen háború folytatás lesz az utolsó szerepe, mint Steve Rogers, vagyis a kapitány.

Officially wrapped on Avengers 4. It was an emotional day to say the least. Playing this role over the last 8 years has been an honor. To everyone in front of the camera,…

summary: News | Chris Evans Dice Addio all’MCU
title: News | Chris Evans Dice Addio all’MCU
body:
News | Chris Evans Dice Addio all’MCU

Buon giorno pelatini,

Sapevamo che questo giorno sarebbe arrivato, ma ciò non toglie che sia un giorno difficile per tutti i fan del Marvel Cinematic Universe, in particolar modo per i fan di Captain America.

Chris Evans ha infatti annunciato di aver terminato il suo ultimo giorno di riprese per Avengers 4, di fatto il suo ultimo giorno in assoluto visto che aveva già confermato in passato che…

News | Chris Evans Dice Addio all’MCU

External image

Buon giorno pelatini,

Sapevamo che questo giorno sarebbe arrivato, ma ciò non toglie che sia un giorno difficile per tutti i fan del Marvel Cinematic Universe, in particolar modo per i fan di Captain America.

Chris Evans ha infatti annunciato di aver terminato il suo ultimo giorno di riprese per Avengers 4, di fatto il suo ultimo giorno in assoluto visto che aveva già confermato in passato che…
